title: Email marketing automation
snippet: I would like to set up some email automation on my website using Sumome.  I want to offer a lead magnet and collect email addresses into a list.  I also would like to be able to segment lists in the future based on the lead magnet.  I am currently using Mailchimp but I'm not committed and my list is so small it would be easy to move.  In addition to automated my list building, I want to automate some of my social media marketing on Facebook and Twitter.
